nodes.text: Avin Solus was a Mandalorian male who resided at the Mandalorian settlement of Arumorut, located on the Outer Rim world of Vlemoth Port, in the years that followed the Clone Wars. A mercenary by trade, Solus and several other mercenaries from Arumorut were contracted by a local crime lord on Tatooine to eliminate the operation of a Thalassian slaver named Nok. Nok learned of the Mandalorians' impending assault and laid a trap for the mercenaries, but one of the Thalassian's slaves—a five-year-old boy—warned the Mandalorians of the trap before Nok was able to spring it. After the battle was through, Avin Solus adopted the young boy, Kad Solus, and raised him as his own son at Arumorut.
Avin Solus was first introduced to the Star Wars universe in the roleplaying game adventure book Friends Like These, published on December 8, 2016 by Fantasy Flight Games.
